"Xiera":
"Xiera here! Good work solving
the problems those Phantoms
had! I owe you a big one for this!"

"I can't believe you were able to
show those hate-filled people how
to enjoy Christmas peacefully...
I'm super impressed!"

"Hahaha... Christmas is a time for
miracles, after all. Looks like
you've been up to some fun, Xiera."

"Yes, it's been a lot of fun... Ghk!
Xi... Xiao?!"

"So, it was your fault this time
too? I'm looking forward to
receiving your full report on this
incident. By tomorrow, please."

"Agh... There goes my Christmas!
Help me out here, <%me>!
Let me join in with your celebration!"
